def solve():
    N=int(raw_input())
    start = [int(i) for i in raw_input().split()]
    end = [int(i) for i in raw_input().split()]
    times=[0]*1001
    for i in range(N):
        for j in range(start[i],end[i]):
            times[j]+=1
    m=0
    for i in times:
        if i>m:
            m=i
    print m

for i in range(int(raw_input())):
    solve()
